description=LOLIN D32 PRO
upload.tool=esptool
upload.maximum_size=1310720
upload.maximum_data_size=327680
upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
serial.disableDTR=true
serial.disableRTS=true
build.mcu=esp32
build.core=esp32
build.variant=d32_pro
build.board=LOLIN_D32_PRO
build.f_cpu=240000000L
build.flash_size=4MB
build.flash_freq=40m
build.flash_mode=dio
build.boot=dio
build.defines=

options.PSRAM.name=PSRAM
options.PSRAM.purge=true
options.PSRAM.default=disabled
options.PSRAM.disabled.name=Disabled
options.PSRAM.disabled.build.defines=
options.PSRAM.enabled.name=Enabled
options.PSRAM.enabled.build.defines=-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM::-mfix-esp32-psram-cache-issue
build.defines=${option:PSRAM.build.defines}

options.FlashFreq.name=Flash Frequency
options.FlashFreq.default=80
options.FlashFreq.80.name=80MHz
options.FlashFreq.80.build.flash_freq=80m
options.FlashFreq.40.name=40MHz
options.FlashFreq.40.build.flash_freq=40m
build.flash_freq=${option:FlashFreq.build.flash_freq}

name=d32-pro
family=esp32
group=ESP32
core=esp32
